arts.ttl: Serie A | Fiorentina 1-2 Udinese: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina faced a surprising setback at home, suffering their first Serie A defeat in 19 matches as Udinese came from behind to secure a 2-1 victory. The match, held at Stadio Artemio Franchi, saw Fiorentina initially take the lead through Moise Kean's penalty just eight minutes into the game. The post Serie A | Fiorentina 1-2 Udinese: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

Edoardo Bove set to cheer on Fiorentina against Udinese
arts.sum: Fiorentina's match against Udinese this evening will carry special significance as midfielder Edoardo Bove returns to the Artemio Franchi stadium for the first time since his frightening collapse during the game against Inter Milan on December 1st. The post Edoardo Bove set to cheer on Fiorentina against Udinese appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs Udinese Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Fiorentina will look to return to winning ways when they host Udinese in Serie A this evening. Ahead of the clash, we’ve made a prediction for the game, provided our predicted line-ups for b...

The last seven Serie A meetings between Fiorentina and Udinese have seen both teams win three games each (one draw). Fiorentina have scored 32 home goals in all competitions this season, more than any other Serie A side.
